title: 18 These Consumer Trends Are Driving Restaurant Growth and Contraction
description: On this episode of The Barron Report, Paul Barron analyzes Foodable Labs data around two generations that are causing major shakeups in the restaurant industry: Millennials and Generation Z. We look at the frequency of restaurant visits, guest counts, and popular social platforms within these groups to give your concept insights into how to win with this major market segment.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
